name: Core Release 10.0
description: We are pleased to announce the release of new version of platform API version. The following list contains the enhancements and Bug fixes.

ADDED.text: Added new option to register and login with username and email
New APIs added : check whether username exists or not (Client)
New APIs added : check whether username exists or not (Server)
New APIs added : Change UserName by AcoountID
New APIs added : Set UserName by AcoountID
Added feature to populate Country code from Country name or vice versa
Instagram support for LoginRadius Photo, Video and Follower API added
New API added that Generate reset password GUID
Console logs added to SSO JS

FIXED.text: Error messages issue fixed of User Reg.API
Uid was getting changed after email verification
No email for verification in case of optional email verification option
Set password and change password are now work without account linking method, dependency removed
